6.1.5. netCDF related options¶

ncMode¶
Requirement:

Optional
Description:

Determine if the output files should be written in netCDF format.
Configuration:
Value Comments
0 Output files are kept as plain text files (i.e., .txt).
1 Output files will be written in netCDF format (i.e., .nc).
nRow¶
Requirement:Optional
Description:Number of rows (e.g., 36) in the output layout (only applicable when ncMode=1).
Configuration:to fill
nCol¶
Requirement:Optional
Description:Number of columns (e.g., 47) in the output layout (only applicable when ncMode=1).
Configuration:to fill
